briefTitle: Short-Term Fasting During Chemotherapy in Patients With Gynecological Cancer- a Randomized Controlled Cross-over Trial
officialTitle: Short-Term Fasting During Chemotherapy in Patients With Gynecological Cancer- a Randomized Controlled Cross-over Trial
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Ovarian cancer or breast cancer
* scheduled chemotherapy
* First diagnosis or 1.recurrence

mono

Exclusion Criteria:

* cachexia (BMI \< 21kg/m2)
* eating disorder
* renal failure (Crea \>2mg/dl)
* enterostoma
* short bowel syndrome
* not assigned to other studies
